Package org.apache.wiki.api.filters

Filter's API package of JSPWiki.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PageFilter
    Provides a definition for a page filter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicPageFilter
    Provides a base implementation of a PageFilter.

Package org.apache.wiki.api.filters Description

Filter's API package of JSPWiki. This package holds JSPWiki's Filter API.
